description: Reference Link https www kaggle com danielwolffram topic modeling finding related articles data Read the metadata Check the columns in metadata We need the sha unique key for each of the json file abstract and lincense Reference to coronavirus as mentioned in papers There are 45774 json files For each files there are multiple texts For each files we take the unique file name and add the texts in rows in a dictionary As discussed There are 45774 files Where 198853 texts contains any reference of coronavirus And 945594 texts that doesn t contain any reference of coronavirus Ann Modelling Topic Modeling Symptoms and the organs that might be affected by coronavirus are listed Making wordcloud Symptoms for the texts that contain reference to coronavirus Symptoms for the texts that doesn t contain reference to coronavirus Organs for the texts that contain reference to coronavirus Organs for the texts that doesn t contain reference to coronavirus Bar Chart For Symptoms For organs  axis 1
